items.name: var autoProxyConfigurationEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if proxy auto-configuration is enabled.

items.name: var proxyAutoConfigurationURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL specifying the location from where the Proxy Auto Configuration (PAC) script should be downloaded.

items.name: var proxyAutoConfigurationJavaScript: String?
items.desc: A string containing the Proxy Auto Configuration (PAC) JavaScript source code.

items.name: var httpEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTP proxy will be used.

items.name: var httpServer: NEProxyServer?
items.desc: An NEProxyServer object containing the static HTTP proxy server settings.

items.name: var httpsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTPS proxy will be used.

items.name: var httpsServer: NEProxyServer?
items.desc: An NEProxyServer object containing the static HTTPS proxy server settings.

items.name: class NEProxyServer
items.desc: NEProxyServer contains settings for a proxy server.

items.name: var excludeSimpleHostnames: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if HTTP requests using single-label host names should be excluded from using the proxy settings.

items.name: var exceptionList: [String]?
items.desc: An array of domain name patterns. If the destination host name of an HTTP connection matches one of these patterns then the proxy settings will not be used for the connection.
